Text:
Hi 20-40,
Thanks for the encode/upload.

Hope the PC you have re-incarnated and cobbled together can hang in their until you get enough donations to help you buy a new one.

I have sent the little I can afford this month, pensioner that I am, but I know that even 30 Euros can help IF you get enough of them.



@ ALL - please help 20-40. Contact me at jon_4fun@hotmaill.com for details on how to help 20-40. Please!!

Thank you
Jon

@All - sorry I mis-wrote my contact e-mail address. It should have been 

jon_4fun@hotmail.com

Thanks
Jon

@ All - apologies for typos in first post.
'hang in their until' should have been 'hang in thERE until'.

&

I put an extra letter in my e-mail address 'l'. It should be
